attributes.review:
Immediately when i opened the app, it asked for my phone number! Mind you, Donald Trump is a known sex offender/rapist. I can’t understand how shameless he can be, to go after my personal info. God forbid what he could do with the info he obtains from this app. 

Don’t waste your time.
attributes.title: So scared.. get this orange cheeto away from me NOW!

attributes.review: ew. this app tried to send me notifications, violating my right to privacy. 😾 I hope this app is taken down immediately and is investigated for fraudulent activity!! ✨🧚‍♀️❤️ oh and this app doesnt work! i opened it and all it said was ‘anyone but trump 2020’ 🥰🧚‍♀️💫  i would give it zero if i could
attributes.title: he has s3x with minors

attributes.review: DO NOT GET THIS APP! After I downloaded it, my phone turned off and would NOT turn back on. I went to my local version to try to fix it but there was nothing they could do. Along with TURNING OFF MY PHONE, the assistant at verison also siad that the app GAINED ACCESS TO ALL MY INFORMATION THAT WAS ON MY PHONE and my information could get SOLD. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP.
attributes.title: PUT A VIRUS ON MY PHONE

attributes.review:
I woke up and decided to download this app to support my dear president 🇺🇸but I noticed my phone was acting weird after I got the app. I miss some calls from my Christian ✝️ friend and I am so mad at this, it is breaking my phone I would not recommend getting!!!!! It does deserve the one star ⭐️ trump 2020 ✨but in a grave stone ✨

DONALD J. TRUMP YOU OWN ME A NEW PHONE!!!!🇺🇸💫

😔
attributes.title: Melania trump 💫

attributes.review: this app is so worthless so what happened was on my birthday december 98th the summer was just around the corner and my mom called me home and then we ate cake on saturday and my grandma all most died anyways so she did say that she was gonna love her life to the fullest and she popped out a whole child which makes me a dad 0/5 stars
attributes.title: NO

attributes.review: I will just say Bunker Boy did it again... disappointment would be an understatement. I truly can’t stand to receive notifications from him :/ next time maybe focus on running a country and not creating an app ☺️ . If I could give 0 stars I would.
attributes.title: I have no words

attributes.review: Not only is the one of the most bias sources I have ever come across it is borderline hateful! Not to mention never once on a “news” app have I had to enter my phone number! If you truly value your privacy and our country do not even attempt to get this app.
attributes.title: This app is disgusting

attributes.review: 10/10 would NEVER recommend, it gives so many ads and it says you can do stuff on there but you literally cant, theres barely anything of the stuff it says you could do that you can actually do!!! TERRIBLE APP! if i could give it a 0 star, i would.
attributes.title: terrbile!!!

attributes.review: Originally when I saw the reviews I thought this was just another social media gen z joke or something. I was wrong. There are so many flaws to this app I don’t even know where to begin. One star, COMPLETELY wasted my time. Truly disappointing. This app killed my dog.
attributes.title: Where do I even start...

attributes.review: I wanted to know about all the stuff our president does but what do I find that he has a brother all my life I thought he was an only child because of how much ego he had but nope he has siblings and I’m praying that he will see that he has such a big ego!! Do not recommend this app!!!!!
attributes.title: Horrible!!!!
